data.text: A Yave, Nzambi yoyi yeti kuphukisa,
Bika lusambulu luama lutula va ntualꞌaku ;
Ndidi mu ntanda wu batu bobo bankuenda ku diyilu
Miangu miaku mimbuila ayi zitu midi
Ngeyo wuphambisa mu bakundi bama bakiluzolo
Wulenda kuaku monisa matsiminanga maku kuidi mutu wufua e ?
Balenda yolukila luzolo luaku mu tsi bafua
Matsiminanga maku malenda zabakanga mu bibuangu bidi tombi
Vayi minu kuidi ngeyo ndinyamikina mu tomba lusadusu,
Bila mbi ngeyo Yave wundozidi e ?
Tona mu bumuana buama minu ndidi mu phasi
Mu lumbu kimvimba yawu yinzungidila banga khuka nlangu
Ngeyo mu bandiatanga yama ayi mu bakiluzolo bama
